mapper.select: SELECT os.order_status_code ,os.member_id ,os.order_status_standard_code ,os.order_detail_code ,os.enter_code ,os.g_code ,os.order_status_update_datetime ,oss.order_status_standard_details FROM tb_order_status AS os INNER JOIn tb_order_status_standard AS oss on os.order_status_standard_code = oss.order_status_standard_code WHERE order_detail_code = #{orderDetailCode};
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_order_status SET order_status_standard_code = #{orderStatusStandardCode}, order_status_update_datetime = NOW() WHERE order_detail_code = #{orderDetailCode}
mapper.select: SELECT od.order_datetime ,od.order_detail_code ,od.order_amount ,od.regular_price_subtotal ,g.g_name ,d.d_get_name ,d.d_get_addr ,d.d_get_phone ,d.d_memo ,oss.order_status_standard_details ,d.delivery_enter ,d.delivery_num ,gmi.main_image_original_name ,gmi.main_image_path FROM tb_order_detail AS od INNER join tb_enterprise AS ent ON ent.enter_code = od.enter_code INNER join tb_goods AS g ON od.g_code = g.g_code INNER JOIN tb_goods_main_image AS gmi ON gmi.main_image_idx = g.g_main_image LEFT JOIN tb_delivery AS d on d.order_detail_code = od.order_detail_code left join tb_order_status AS os on os.order_status_code = d.order_status_code left JOIN tb_order_status_standard AS oss on os.order_status_standard_code = oss.order_status_standard_code where od.order_detail_code = #{orderDetailCode};

SELECT od.order_detail_code AS orderDetailCode, g.g_main_image as goodsMainImage, g.g_name as goodsName, g.g_code as goodsCode, om.add_discount_price AS disPricAdd, od.discount_price AS discountPrice, od.regular_price_subtotal as regularPriceSubtotal, od.order_amount as orderAmount, od.order_datetime as orderDatetime, oss.order_status_standard_details as orderStatusStandardDetails, d.d_get_name AS deliGetName, d.d_get_addr AS deliGetAddr, d.d_get_phone AS deliGetPhone, d.d_memo AS deliMemo, d.delivery_num as deliveryNumber ,gmi.main_image_original_name AS mainImageOriName ,gmi.main_image_path AS mainImagePath ,ent.enter_name AS entName ,od.g_delivery_charge AS deliCharge ,om.add_discount_price AS disPriceAdd ,p.payment_cash_sum AS paySum ,p.payment_input_bank_card_number AS payBankNum ,p.payment_type AS payType ,p.payment_agency AS payBank ,p.payment_payer_name AS payName FROM tb_order_detail AS od INNER JOIN tb_order_management AS om on od.order_group_code = om.order_group_code INNER join tb_goods AS g on g.g_code = od.g_code INNER JOIN tb_goods_main_image AS gmi ON gmi.main_image_idx = g.g_main_image INNER Join tb_order_status AS os on os.order_detail_code = od.order_detail_code INNER join tb_order_status_standard AS oss on oss.order_status_standard_code = os.order_status_standard_code left join tb_delivery AS d on d.order_detail_code = od.order_detail_code INNER JOIN tb_enterprise AS ent on ent.enter_code = od.enter_code INNER JOIN tb_payment_by_order AS p on om.order_code = p.order_code WHERE od.order_detail_code = #{orderDetailCode}

SELECT om.order_code as orderCode, group_concat(g.g_name SEPARATOR ', ') as goodsName, om.final_price as finalPrice, od.order_datetime AS orderDatetime, om.order_group_code AS orderGroupCode, om.add_discount_price AS discountAdd, om.regular_price_subtotal AS subPrice, om.g_delivery_charge_total as deliTotal ,gmi.main_image_original_name AS mainImageOriName ,gmi.main_image_path AS mainImagePath FROM tb_order_management AS om INNER JOIN tb_order_detail AS od ON od.order_group_code = om.order_group_code LEFT JOIN tb_goods AS g on g.g_code = od.g_code inner JOIN tb_order_status AS os on os.order_detail_code = od.order_detail_code INNER JOIN tb_order_status_standard AS oss on oss.order_status_standard_code = os.order_status_standard_code INNER JOIN tb_goods_main_image AS gmi ON gmi.main_image_idx = g.g_main_image WHERE od.member_id = #{memberId} GROUP BY om.order_code ORDER BY os.order_status_update_datetime;

SELECT od.order_group_code as orderGroupCode, g.g_main_image as goodsMainImage, g.g_name as goodsName, g.g_code AS goodsCode, om.add_discount_price AS disPricAdd, od.discount_price AS discountPrice, od.regular_price_subtotal as regularPriceSubtotal, od.order_amount as orderAmount, od.order_datetime as orderDatetime, oss.order_status_standard_details as orderStatusStandardDetails, d.delivery_enter as deliveryEnter, d.delivery_num as deliveryNumber ,gmi.main_image_original_name AS mainImageOriName ,gmi.main_image_path AS mainImagePath ,ent.enter_name AS entName ,od.g_delivery_charge AS deliCharge ,om.add_discount_price AS disPriceAdd FROM tb_order_detail AS od INNER JOIN tb_order_management AS om on od.order_group_code = om.order_group_code INNER join tb_goods AS g on g.g_code = od.g_code INNER JOIN tb_goods_main_image AS gmi ON gmi.main_image_idx = g.g_main_image INNER Join tb_order_status AS os on os.order_detail_code = od.order_detail_code INNER join tb_order_status_standard AS oss on oss.order_status_standard_code = os.order_status_standard_code left join tb_delivery AS d on d.order_detail_code = od.order_detail_code INNER JOIN tb_enterprise AS ent on ent.enter_code = od.enter_code WHERE od.order_group_code = #{orderGroupCode};

SELECT p.payment_input_bank_card_number AS paymentInputNumber, p.payment_agency AS paymentBank, p.payment_cash_sum AS paymentCash, p.payment_date AS paymentDate, p.payment_payer_name AS paymentPayer FROM tb_payment_by_order AS p INNER join tb_order_management AS om on p.order_code = om.order_code WHERE om.order_group_code = #{orderGroupCode};

SELECT d.d_type AS deliType, d.d_get_name AS deliName, d.d_get_addr AS deliAddress, d.d_get_phone AS deliPhone, d.d_memo AS deliMemo FROM tb_delivery AS d LEFT join tb_order_detail AS od on d.order_detail_code = od.order_detail_code WHERE od.order_group_code = #{orderGroupCode} GROUP by od.order_group_code;
